department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Welding, fabricating, and machining services for various types of equipment, components, and attachments, such as, but not limited to, heavy equipment, runway support equipment, construction and agricultural equipment.
description: Transportation Electrical and Mechanical Engineering Flight (TEME Flt), 8 Wing Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Trenton requires a Contractor to supply all labour, materials and equipment necessary to perform all types of welding, fabricating and machining services using all types of steel, aluminum and stainless on various types of equipment, components and attachments such as, but not limited to, heavy equipment, runway support equipment, construction and agricultural equipment on an  as and when  requested basis. It is intended to issue one standing offer for Welding and Fabricating Services - General Stream.
duration_in_months: >#amend THE duration is from the date of issuance until August 31, 2027, so from now until August 31, 2027. NOTE: ideaLD durations are defined in months from date of award of contract
